Name: from view
About the game: from view is a short and hopeful game about exploring beautiful and surreal dioramas from different points of view in order to find switches, items, and clues. Five shrines are scattered across the world. Once beacons of light and symbols of a better, kinder future they now lie dark and dormant. You will set out to gather the Sunstones and restore the light of the shrines. There are no threats to overcome, no opponents to defeat, and no clock to rush against. Instead you will discover and solve puzzles, find hidden items and clues, and wander through lovely scenery. Change your perspective. Discover hidden secrets. Unlock the lost shrines.
